JobFullDesc: What is Yammer?Microsoft Yammer is the industry-defining social network for the enterprise. Millions of employees, including 85% of Fortune 500 companies, use Yammer every day, to build community and culture, share knowledge, and connect with their leaders and each other. Why Yammer?Yammer was one of the first startup unicorns this past decade and was acquired by Microsoft in 2012.  Today, this means we get the benefits of a startup - rapid innovation, cutting-edge technology, outsized individual impact - with the advantages of working for one of the most successful software companies in the world. We work together in small, cross-functional teams - engineers, product managers, designers, data scientists - to design, deliver and operate delightful end user experiences to our tens of millions of users spread across the world. We’ve always been mission-driven. In this post-Covid world, Yammer has become even more indispensable as employees have a deep need for connection and a sense of belonging. We’ve been growing rapidly and need your help to take Yammer to the next level. You will have:Autonomy and freedom to innovateChoice of the best of open source and Microsoft-internal technology The ability to experiment, A/B test, and make data-driven decisionsTons of opportunity for outsized impact as part of a small but mighty team on a rapidly-growing product needed now more than everAt the same time, you also have the benefits of working at a top-tier tech company like Microsoft: Compensation, benefits, and perksInternal resources, technology, and opportunities for learning and growth Brand and networking Opportunity for massive scale as part of a suite with hundreds of millions of usersAbout this job  On the Yammer UX team, our goal is to empower individuals to build connections and community across their organizations. Our team is a highly collaborative group of designers, researchers and content writers who value creativity, open idea sharing, and having fun while we work. Most of all, we’re motivated by our millions of diverse users.  In this role, you will work with designers, data scientists, product managers and engineers to create forward-thinking strategy and user scenario-driven features to help the org meet business goals. We are seeking an experienced researcher with a passion & skill for generating customer insights to help guide the development of Yammer and M365 products. You will be joining a growing team of Designers and Researchers in shaping the process and methodology of turning customer insights into customer experiences.ResponsibilitiesPartner with PM & Engineering teams to understand product goals and strategies   Create research plans that involve and engage your team and impact product design and quality  Design and execute appropriate research activities to answer relevant design and/or business questions, leveraging and triangulating both qualitative and quantitative methods (observation, interviews, journals, ethnography, surveys, lab studies, instrumentation, etc.)  Provide the design team with research context, perspective, and recommendations on what will make our products and services both useful and delightful  Communicate research findings through persuasive, compelling written reports and group presentations  Bring a wide range of both established and innovative research methods to your work and develop new methods where needed to evolve the desirability of our experiences  Contribute your research and perspective through the entire product design cycle, from planning to implementation to post-release  Partner with other researchers across Microsoft both to gain insights from other teams as well as share our insights broadly across the companyQualificationsObsess over the customer and their needs and motivations 5+ years of hands-on experience conducting UX research  Fluency in both qualitative and quantitative methodologiesBachelor's degree in behavioral or social sciences (or a related field) or comparableYammer is deeply committed to diversity. We believe that the best software comes from diverse, inclusive teams that celebrate the unique backgrounds, perspectives, and skills of all team members. The more we come together, the more we will achieve. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.  We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form. Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.
